altTitles.ja: 飛雷刀

description.en:
A young orphan was alone in the world until he meets the master of a secret form of martial arts. To learn these otherworldly techniques, he will need to endure years of his sadistic teacher’s grueling and weird training. But why does he have to do laundry, cook meals, or play instruments to learn martial arts anyway?! If he can survive long enough (and if his massive ego doesn’t get in the way), he just might be able to wield the unstoppable lightning knives. Will he make the cut or be sliced down to size?

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PlMScBLMT0U)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B9%84%EB%A2%B0%EB%8F%84/2355)

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/52248)
description.ja:
5歳の時母親が亡くなり、10歳の時伝染病で父親まで亡くなった少年「飛雲」。彼は彫刻家だった父からその才能を受け継いでいた。 両親の木像を作り、二人の墓の前にそなえたある日、それを見た老人から「自分を師匠にすれば天下一の武術を教えよう」と話しかけられる。怪しいとは思ったものの老人が見せた武術に惹かれその申し出を受けてしまった飛雲。案の定、武術などろくに教えず、訓練といいながら家事と金稼ぎばかり… そんなある日、女装して働いている酒楼で偶然武林盟主の娘である「羅 香凜」の命を救った。飛雲は男であることを隠して香凜と親しくなるが…

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PlMScBLMT0U)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B9%84%EB%A2%B0%EB%8F%84/2355)

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/52248)
description.ko:
홀로 길러주신 아버지를 돌림병으로 잃고 10세의 어린 나이에 혈혈단신이 된 비류연.
조각가였던 아버지에게 배운 기술로 부모님의 조각상을 만들어 두 분의 묘 앞에 세워두는데,
지나가던 노인이 그걸 보더니 자신을 사부로 삼으면 천하제일 무공을 가르쳐주겠다고 한다.

수상쩍지만 달리 갈 곳도 없고, 그럴듯해 보이는 무공에 혹해 비류연은 그를 따라가고 마는데…

그날 이후 비류연을 길러준 것은 팔할이 바람이었다.

오늘 하루는 좀 편안했으면 좋겠다는 바람!
사부가 더 늙으면 울 때까지 구박해주겠다는 바람!
아니 다 필요 없고 여기서 탈출하고 싶다는 바람!
하늘이여 저한테 왜 이러세요 제발 살려주세요… 하는 바람!

하늘이 비류연의 바람을 들어준 것일까.
무식한 가사노동과 피골상접 과로사를 야기할 것 같던 돈벌이로 점철된 삶 속에서
깨알같이 사부 몰래 힘을 비축하던 비류연은 드디어 어느 날 깨닫는다.

‘오늘이 바로 그날이다!’

사부를 따돌릴 꿀떡(?)을 던져놓고는 무한한 용기를 발휘해 묵금과 비뢰도까지 다 들고 튄 비류연.

혹자는 강호를 두고 시산혈해 위에 암투로 쌓아올린 백척간두의 세계라고 하나,
비류연에겐 드넓은 꿀 천지에 온실 속의 화초들이 노니는 안락한 신세계로만 보였는데…!

비류연의 행복은 과연 언제까지 갈 것인가!

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PlMScBLMT0U)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B9%84%EB%A2%B0%EB%8F%84/2355)

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/52248)
description.ru:
В 10 лет Би Рю Ён становится сиротой, потеряв последнего родственника, своего отца.

Будучи хорошим сыном и отличным подмастерьем весьма талантливого ремесленника, он решает соорудить две прекрасные статуи в память о своих родителях. Так, когда работа была практически завершена, к нему неожиданно обратился некий старый мастер, пожелав стать наставником парня, и обещая обучить самому могущественному искусству во всей Поднебесной.

Жажда до силы превозмогает сомнения. И он решает последовать за стариком… 

С этого момента... жизнь круто изменилась. Невыносимые тренировки и серьезные наказания следовали по пятам день за днём! Иногда казалось, труд настолько изматывал мальчика, что кожа прилипала к костям, а смерть от переутомления уже маячила на горизонте. Много раз Рю Ён хотел бросить всё и покинуть наставника. Возгласы, «О Небо, за что мне всё это?! Кто-нибудь, спасите меня!» - не сходили с его уст. Но Небеса оставались безмолвны.

И вот, в один из множества преисполненных изнеможением и страданиями дней, когда сил осталось с кунжутное зёрнышка, он понял: «Это оно!»

Сегодня Рю Ён превзойдёт своего учителя и узнает, что такое "Меч разящего грома".

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PlMScBLMT0U)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B9%84%EB%A2%B0%EB%8F%84/2355)

altTitles.ja: 大室家

description.en:
*A spin-off of the YuruYuri series featuring the Oomuro family of sisters!*

From oldest to youngest, there's **Nadeshiko**, the cool and serious high schooler; **Sakurako**, the silly, lazy, and (slightly) dimwitted middle schooler; and **Hanako**, the intelligent and mature elementary schooler! 

This story focuses on these three sisters, their friends. and the many fun and wild adventures they have together!
description.ja: 優秀な長女・撫子、残念な次女・櫻子、優秀な三女・花子からなる大室家３姉妹。自由奔放な櫻子を中心に今日も大室さん家は賑やかです♪

description.en:
To regain a piece of my lost memory and to fulfill the promise I made that day I came back to this town.
This is the story of the main character "Haruto" who has lost his childhood memories, and his attempt to regain his missing memories and only remaining "promise to a girl whose face and name he does not know."

note: The hit game with over 6 million downloads has been adapted into a comic book!

altTitles.ja: 一人だけレベルアップします！

description.en:
Living in a world infested with monsters is hard enough, but doing it without powers? That’s Hanyeol’s life in a nutshell.

Fearsome beasts roam the earth and kill everyone in their path. Elite members of society called the Awakened mobilize to protect humanity with their supernatural abilities. Amidst it all, Hanyeol is just a poor porter, tasked as sideline support.

But when a benevolent being gifts him with special abilities, he’s ready to harvest all the loot and take it to the next level!

description.en: Takeru, a “Nurturer,” who was born into a family that trains monsters. To make money, he accepts requests from the Demon King and works hard to raise vicious monsters. One night, a wounded witch visits him and asks him to train Anna, a young girl. In fact, Anna is the last survivor of a legendary witch family… Will a bond be formed between Anna, whose ultimate goal is to destroy the world, and Takeru, the best “Nurturer” in the demon world? What will become of the world?

altTitles.th: ชายเลวหมื่นลี้ทานตะวัน

altTitles.ja: 負けヒロイン救済計画

description.en:
Why torment scumbags for just a moment when you can do so forever? Join Su LuXia as she transmigrates into countless worlds with her ‘Supporting Female Character’s Counterattack System’ to unleash vengeance upon the deplorable male and female leads using a variety of tactics! 

Su LuXia: "The only thing that brings me comfort is the tears of remorse from scumbag men and the agonizing groans of despicable women who can't get what they want." 

System: "Has My Esteemed Host learnt to reel back her vengeful spirit? Nope, I guess not."
description.fr:
Su Lüxia fait partie d'un "Système de rôle féminin".
Sa mission : en se téléportant dans les corps des femmes trompées et bafouées, elle renverse leur destinée.
"Seules les larmes d'un bâtard de tricheur et les gémissements de douleur d'une garce m'apportent le réconfort."
description.it:
Schiacciare un verme per un solo momento dà una soddisfazione momentanea, ma le vite passate a schiacciare i vermi forniscono vite di soddisfazione continua. Su Lüxia, la nostra protagonista femminile, trasmigra in altri mondi con il sistema di contrattacco della seconda protagonista femminile; usa schemi e trucchi elaborati per picchiare innumerevoli bastardi traditori e puttane.

Su Lüxia: "Solo le lacrime di rimorso di un bastardo traditore, e i gemiti di dolore di una puttana incapace di ottenere ciò che vuole, mi danno conforto."

Sistema: "Il mio ospite ha attinto alla sua umanità oggi? No."

altTitles.ja: シノニム

description.en: The manga centers on Yano, a virgin boy who dreams of success as an erotic manga artist. One day, he encounters a totally naked palm-sized girl.
description.ja: エロ漫画家として成功を夢みる専門学生・矢野。彼の前に突然、手のひらサイズの美少女が現れる。漫画賞を目指したいのに、俺の弁当に何かいるんです！

description.en:
When Nagyunn’s twin brother, Najin, is murdered before his very eyes, he vows to avenge his brother’s death by assuming Najin’s identity. 

But although the two may look alike, when it comes to fighting, Nagyunn lacks the talent and skill his brother possessed. In order to successfully execute his plot for revenge, Nagyunn resolves to train himself to become the prodigious knight-in-training his brother once was. 

Will Nagyunn be able to keep his identity a secret before others begin to catch on to his act?

某天，洛辰洛谦两兄弟家里来了一伙神秘人，他们企图杀害弟弟洛辰。洛辰是整个大陆最有实力的预备骑士，而洛谦却是一个手无缚鸡之力的少年。危机时刻洛辰为了保护哥哥丧命于家中。哥哥洛谦为了查明真相，找出真凶，于是假扮成弟弟成为了一名骑士。但哥哥洛谦并没有骑士资质，他只能依靠伪装骗过众人，同时寻找神秘人为弟弟报仇。软弱的洛谦可以成功找到真相为弟弟复仇吗？

description.pt-br: Tae, uma linda garota de 17 anos, e Kotaro, um sério trabalhador de escritório. Essas duas pessoas aparentemente felizes têm um segredo que não podem revelar a ninguém - os ninjas rivais de Iga e Kouga vivem secretamente juntos nesta comédia romântica descontraída!

description.en: Naoto Kiyoshi is a young man who just entered university after failing his entrance exams one year before. When he was looking for a place to live in so that he could move to Tokyo, he found himself living together with Luna, a relative and older girl who he used to have a crush on. The Luna he admired in the past was neat, beautiful and mature... and now she apparently became a slut!? Night after night, he hears her seductive and unladylike moans, and it's making Naoto horny. There are also other men she's unreasonably close to besides him. Luna, whose thoughts he couldn't fathom, is leading him around by the nose! Furthermore, other women with lewd quirks aside from Luna have also gathered there!?
description.ja: 一浪して大学に合格した青年・木吉直人。上京のために住める場所を探していたところ、親戚で憧れの姉・月(ルナ)の家で同棲することに。 昔憧れていた月は垢ぬけて、美しく成長し…そして…ビッチになっていた!?夜な夜なあられもない嬌声を聞き、モンモンとする直人。他の男性がいる割に距離感もめちゃくちゃ近い。何を考えているか分からない月に翻弄され、さらに月以外のエッチで癖が強い女の子たちも集まりだし…!?
description.pt-br:
De repente estou morando com a garota mais velha por quem eu tinha uma queda!? Ainda mais, estou começando a suspeitar que ela é uma vagabunda!?

Naoto Kiyoshi é um jovem que acabou de entrar na universidade depois de ser reprovado nos exames de admissão um ano antes. Quando ele estava procurando um lugar para morar para poder se mudar para Tóquio, ele se viu morando com Luna, uma parente e garota mais velha por quem ele tinha uma queda.

A Luna que ele admirava no passado era arrumada, bonita e madura... e agora ela aparentemente se tornou uma vagabunda!? Noite após noite, ele ouve seus gemidos sedutores e pouco femininos, e isso está deixando Naoto excitado. Há também outros homens de quem ela é irracionalmente próxima além dele. Luna, cujos pensamentos ele não conseguia entender, está o levando pelo nariz! Além disso, outras mulheres com peculiaridades obscenas além de Luna também se reuniram lá!?

Este é o início de sua nova vida emocionante cercado por garotas mais velhas safadas(?)!

Tsukasa, a young man with shattered dreams, and Inori, a girl no one believed in. However, in the face of adversity, those two possessed a tenacity towards the rink greater than anyone had ever known. Together, they meet on the ice, and aim for the world with their figure skating!

description.es:
Tsukasa es un patinador que, tras haber dejado atrás su sueño de convertirse en un atleta de élite por problemas económicos, trabaja realizando espectáculos de patinaje sobre hielo.

Pero todo cambia cuando conoce a Inori, una niña que acude a una pista de hielo a escondidas de su madre, aunque esta esté totalmente en contra de ello y todo el mundo piense que es tarde para ella, y que es demasiado inútil.

Así, gracias a la tenacidad que muestra Inori, Tsukasa decide convertirse en su entrenador y buscará ayudarla en el difícil mundo del patinaje artístico, prometiéndose que la llevará a la cima.

description.en:
Lurking within the shadows of Tokyo are frightening beings known as "ghouls," who satisfy their hunger by feeding on humans once night falls. Ken Kaneki, an unsuspecting university freshman, finds himself caught in a world between humans and ghouls when his date turns out to be a ghoul after his flesh.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
description.ru:
Раса гулей существует с незапамятных времен. Ее представители вовсе не против людей, они их даже любят - преимущественно в сыром виде. Любители человечины внешне неотличимы от нас, сильны, быстры и живучи - но их мало, потому гули выработали строгие правила охоты и маскировки, а нарушителей наказывают сами или по-тихому сдают борцам с нечистью. В век науки люди знают про гулей, но как говорится, привыкли. Власти не считают людоедов угрозой, более того, рассматривают их как идеальную основу для создания суперсолдат. Эксперименты идут уже давно…  
  
Ничего этого не ведал Канэки Кэн, робкий и невзрачный токийский первокурсник, безнадежно влюбленный в красавицу-интеллектуалку Ризэ, частую гостью в кафе «Место встречи», где парень подрабатывает официантом. Не думал Кэн, что скоро самому придется стать гулем, и многие знакомые предстанут в неожиданном свете. Главному герою предстоит мучительный поиск нового пути, ибо он понял, что люди и гули похожи: просто одни друг друга жрут в прямом смысле, другие - в переносном. Правда жизни жестока, переделать ее нельзя, и силен тот, кто не отворачивается. А дальше уж как-нибудь!
description.pt-br: Em Tokyo, criaturas conhecidas como "Ghouls" vivem entre os humanos e os devoram para sobreviver. Alheio a eles, o jovem universitário Ken Kaneki leva uma vida pacata entre livros, até que um trágico encontro o coloca diante desses seres e o obriga a lutar por sua humanidade.

 Todos os dias são uma sobrecarga sensorial para Shunpei, que nunca falou com uma garota, muito menos com uma gal.
 
 É o início de uma comédia escolar engraçada, com um cara introvertido do ensino médio => transformado em Gal.

description.en: Masterless samurai Akitsu Masanosuke is a skilled and loyal swordsman, but his naïve, diffident nature has time and again caused him to be let go by the lords who have employed him. Hungry and desperate, he becomes a bodyguard for Yaichi, the charismatic leader of a gang called "Five Leaves." Although disturbed by the gang's sinister activities, Masa begins to suspect that Yaichi's motivations are not what they seem. And despite his misgivings, the deeper he's drawn into the world of the Five Leaves, the more he finds himself fascinated by these devious, mysterious outlaws.

description.en: Nature made Ash Lynx beautiful; nurture made him a cold ruthless killer. A runaway brought up as the adopted heir and sex toy of "Papa" Dino Golzine, Ash, now at the rebellious age of seventeen, forsakes the kingdom held out by the devil who raised him. But the hideous secret that drove Ash's older brother mad in Vietnam has suddenly fallen into Papa's insatiably ambitious hands—and it's exactly the wrong time for Eiji Okamura, a pure-hearted young photographer from Japan, to make Ash Lynx's acquaintance…
description.tr: Tanrı, Ash Lynx’i güzeller güzeli bir çocuk olarak yarattı; dünya onu soğukkanlı acımasız bir katil haline getirdi. Çocuk yaşta evden kaçan Ash, “Baba” Dino Golzine tarafından bulunur ve hem mafyanın varisi olarak hem de Golzine’nin şahsi zevklerini tatmin etmek üzere yetiştirilir. Şimdi 17 yaşında isyankar bir genç olan Ash kendisini yetiştiren şeytanın ona sunduğu krallığa sırtını döner. Ancak Ash’in ağabeyinin Vietnam’da aklını yitirmesine sebep olan korkunç sır, hırsı dur durak bilmeyen Golzine’nin ellerine düşmüştür. İşte tam bu sırada genç bir fotoğrafçı Japonya’dan New York’a gelir. Temiz kalpli Eiji Okumura ve Ash Lynx olabilecek en talihsiz zamanda karşılaşır.
description.pt-br: A natureza fez Ash Lynx um cara bonito; mas o tempo fez dele um assassino cruel e frívolo. Uma criança fugitiva criada como um herdeiro adotado, um guerreiro treinado, e o brinquedo sexual de seu “Papa”, Dino Golzine, o senhor do crime da Costa do Oeste Oriental. Ash está agora na idade rebelde dos dezessete anos – abandonando o reino de poder e riqueza, realizada pelo demônio que o ressuscitou, preferindo um código para viver entre um pequeno, mas fiel, gangue de bandidos de rua. Porém, “Papa” não pode simplesmente deixá-lo ir. Não quando descobre que o segredo que levou o irmão mais velho de Ash a loucura, no Vietnã, poderá cair em suas mãos insaciavelmente ambiciosas. É exatamente o momento errado para Eiji Okamura, um jovem fotógrafo do Japão, de coração puro, chegar em Nova York e travar conhecimento de Ash Lynx… e ao seu lado, ser atraído para dentro de um redemoinho sangrento de orgulho, ganância, luxúria e ira desencadeada pelo enigma de codinome Banana Fish.

description.en:
Yeoju is a second-rate author living a mediocre existence in modern-day Korea. A tragic accident lands her in the plot of a bestselling martial arts novel and she wakes up as the infamous villainess Haewon Tang. Hoping to save herself from a gruesome death, Yeoju must figure out who to trust, harness Haewon’s inner chi, and learn martial arts as she fights to save the Sichuan Tang Clan. Can she change the outcome of the novel and prove she’s the worthy hero?

---
Our main character was an unsuccessful romance fantasy novelist when she gets into a hit-and-run then wakes up as the villainess in a best-selling martial arts novel. She uses the information from the novel that she had analyzed in her original life, in order to avoid her death-ending and finding the truth behind what had really happened to her.

description.fr:
Notre personnage principal était une romancière de romans fantastiques sans succès lorsqu'elle a été victime d'un délit de fuite et s'est réveillée en tant que la méchante dans un roman d'arts martiaux à succès. Elle utilise les informations du roman qu'elle avait analysées dans sa vie d'origine, afin d'éviter sa mort et de découvrir la vérité sur ce qui lui est réellement arrivée.

description.hu:
Főszereplőnk egy sikertelen romantikus regényíró, aki autóbalesetet szenved és egy másik világban tér magához. Abban a világban, amiről nemrég olvasott. Méghozzá a regény gonosztevőjeként, aki elnyerve méltó büntetését a végén meghal. Csakhogy főszereplőnknek esze ágában sincs meghalni, helyette kiaknázza a sztori ismeretében és saját harcművészeti tudásában rejlő lehetőségeket.

description.id:
Seorang penulis novel romansa fantasi mengalami kecelakaan tabrak lari, tapi begitu sadar kembali, ia menyadari dirinya jadi Dang Haewon, pemeran pembantu dalam novel yang pernah ia baca. Namun, Dang Haewon adalah tokoh jahat dan kejam yang mencoba membunuh pemeran utama wanita demi mendapatkan pemeran utama pria hingga mengakibatkan dirinya terbunuh. Tidak mau nasibnya berakhir seperti itu, si penulis pun memanfaatkan semua informasi yang didapatkannya sewaktu membaca novel itu. Akankah dia berhasil mengubah nasibnya dan jadi tokoh terkuat di novel itu?

description.it:
Un'autrice di secondo ordine, Yeoju, si ritrova all'interno della trama di un bestseller wuxia, rivestendo i panni della famosa e spietata Haewon Tang. Nella speranza di fuggire da una morte orribile, Yeoju imparerà a utilizzare le arti marziali e a combattere per l'incolumità del Clan Sichuan Tang. Saprà volgere a suo favore la trama del romanzo dimostrando di essere una degna eroina?

description.ja:
現代でロマンスファンタジー作家をしていたはずなのに……　 「南宮世家の若当主」を読んで武侠系の小説家に転向しようとしていた矢先、交通事故に遭って小説の世界に異世界トリップ…！？ しかもそこでの私は最強の悪女”唐海苑”！ 唐海苑が死ぬという物語の結末を知っている私が、このままみすみす犬死するわけにはいかないでしょ！ 未来はこの手で変えてみせる…！

description.ko:
"하필이면 주인공도 아니고,
소설 속 제일가는 악녀라니…"

월세 탈출을 위해 읽기 시작한 무협 소설 『남궁세가 소가주』
그중 최고 악녀 당해원으로 빙의하게 된다.

흠모하던 남자를 얻기 위해
남자의 정인에게 독약을 먹이고,
무림의 고수들을 이간질하고,
마교의 앞잡이가 되어 강호를 혼란에 빠뜨리는
…세계관 최고 악녀, 당해원.

"소설처럼 이렇게 당할 순 없어...!!"

우연히 삼킨 만년삼으로 인해
세계관 최강자가 되어버린
무협 소설 속 최고 악녀 "당해원"의 갱생기!

description.pl:
Nasza główna bohaterka była marną powieściopisarką romansów fantasy, aż pewnego dnia została potrącona w wypadku i obudziła się jako czarny charakter w bestsellerowej powieści o sztukach walki. Wykorzystuje informacje z powieści, które przeanalizowała w swoim pierwotnym życiu, aby uniknąć śmierci i odkryć prawdę o tym, co tak naprawdę się z nią stało.

Наша главная героиня была несостоявшейся писательницей фантастических романов, но когда ее сбивает машина, она просыпается злодейкой в романе-бестселлере боевых искусств. Она использует информацию из книги, которую она проанализировала в своей настоящей жизни, чтобы избежать смерти и найти правду о том, что же случилось с ней на самом деле.

description.th:
ตัวเอกก็ไม่ใช่ แต่มาเป็นตัวร้ายที่ร้ายที่สุดในนิยายเนี่ยนะ…' 
เมื่อนักเขียนอย่างฉันอยากจะลองเปลี่ยนสไตล์การเขียน จึงเริ่มต้นอ่านนิยายกำลังภายในเรื่อง 『นายน้อยแห่งตระกูลนัมกุง』 และเพราะอุบัติเหตุ จู่ๆ ก็ดันได้เข้ามาสิงอยู่ในร่างของทังแฮวอน วายร้ายในนิยายเรื่องนั้นซะได้
เธอร้ายถึงขนาดที่วางยาพิษหญิงสาวผู้เป็นที่รักของชายหนุ่มที่นางรัก แถมยังยุยงให้เหล่าชาวยุทธ์ในยุทธจักรแตกคอกันอีก เท่านั้นยังไม่พอ นางยังทำให้คนของลัทธิปีศาจเข้ามาสร้างความวุ่นวายในยุทธภพอีกด้วย
แต่ฉันจะไม่ยอมมีจุดจบแบบทังแฮวอนในนิยายหรอกนะ ฉันจะมีชีวิตใหม่ ด้วยการเป็นวายร้ายที่แข็งแกร่งที่สุดให้ดู!

description.zh-hk:
「不但不是主角，還偏偏是書裡最惡毒的女人...」

為了擺脫租屋生活
而開始閱讀武俠小說《南宮世家少主》，
卻穿越成為了小說裡最惡毒的女人——唐海媛。

唐海媛這個天下第一惡女為了得到欽慕的男人，
不惜毒殺思慕之人的情人、挑撥武林高手們、
成為魔教的走狗並導致武林動盪。

「絕不能和原本的故事內容一樣，白白送死!!」

偶然吃了萬年參而變成小說世界裡的最強者，
武俠小說最強惡女「唐海媛」的重生記!

description.en:
There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

**Links:**  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
description.ru:
Есть игроки, которые ставят на кон свою жизнь. Чтобы сохранить целостность таких смертельно-опасных игр, жестокая и могущественная организация «Кагэро» судит их, как нейтральная сторона.
Наш герой — Баку Мадарамэ, «Пожиратель лжи». Игрок, чья цель — переиграть и в конце взять под контроль саму нейтральную организацию «Кагэро».

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://mintmanga.live/pojiratel_lji))
description.es-la: Hay jugadores que incluso apuestan su vida como apuesta. Pero para asegurar la integridad de estas apuestas que ponen en peligro la vida, una violenta y poderosa organización llamada "Kakerou" arbitra estos juegos como parte neutral. Sigue a Baku Madarame, también conocido como Usogui (El Devorador de Mentiras), mientras se enfrenta a oponentes maníacos en juegos como "Escapar del Edificio Abandonado", "La Vieja Doncella" y "El Ahorcado", para acabar jugando más que la propia organización neutral de Kakerou

description.ar:
“لو أصبحت رب الأسرة ، لكان الكثير قد تغير …” مات أخي التوأم بيدي. يتحكم بها بالسحر الأسود ، كلوي ، التي تكرر الذبح غير المرغوب فيه ، ينتهي بها الأمر بقتل شقيقها التوأم بيديها. بدون وقت للحزن ، كان رأس السيف موجهًا إلى قلب كلوي. لقيت كلوي موتًا بائسًا. ولكن عندما فتحت عينيها، عادت إلى الماضي. لن أكرر حياتي الماضية. من أجل حماية الأسرة وشقيقها الحبيب ، قررت أن تصبح رب الأسرة بنفسها ، في شكل أخ توأم. “متوقع. أنتم جعلتموني هكذا.”

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54824372), [Naver](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8629075), [Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2057181273)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B9%BC%EC%95%97%EA%B8%B4-%EA%B0%80%EB%AC%B8%EC%9D%98-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%B8%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%98%EB%A0%A4-%ED%95%A9%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3182), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60828356)
description.en:
The Duchy of Francesca rules the northern provinces on behalf of the fallen Imperial family. After the sudden death of the lord of their household, Duke Den, the twins Damian and Chloe become puppets at the hands of their relatives. Controlled by dark magic, Damian becomes the empty-shelled lord of the household while Chloe, who has a natural talent for swordsmanship, becomes an assassin repeatedly committing unwanted murders. Later deemed no longer useful, she falls to dark magic and kills Damian with her hands before meeting her own tragic ending afterward. However, when she opened her eyes once more, she returned to the past. To the past – the day of her beloved father’s, Duke Den’s funeral. From then, Chloe made a decision. A decision to not allow her past life to repeat itself... and to punish her relatives and the vassals who dared turn their backs on her family.

---
“So many things would have been different if you had become the family head…”

*My older twin brother died at my hands.*

Chloe, who was controlled by black magic and forced to murder endlessly against her will, ultimately ends up killing her older twin brother. With barely a moment to mourn, the tip of her sword was immediately pointed at Chloe’s heart. Chloe died a miserable death. But when she opened her eyes again, she realized that she had gone back in time.

*I won’t repeat my past life. In order to protect my family and my beloved older brother, I will personally become the master by becoming my brother.*

“Look forward to it. You are the ones who pushed me to this point.”

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54824372), [Naver](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8629075), [Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2057181273)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B9%BC%EC%95%97%EA%B8%B4-%EA%B0%80%EB%AC%B8%EC%9D%98-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%B8%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%98%EB%A0%A4-%ED%95%A9%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3182), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60828356)
description.id:
Duchy of Francesca memerintah provinsi utara atas nama keluarga Kekaisaran yang jatuh. Setelah kematian mendadak tuan rumah tangga mereka, Duke Den, si kembar Damian dan Chloe menjadi boneka di tangan kerabat mereka. Dikendalikan oleh sihir gelap, Damian menjadi penguasa rumah tangga yang bercangkang kosong sementara Chloe, yang memiliki bakat alami dalam ilmu pedang, menjadi seorang pembunuh yang berulang kali melakukan pembunuhan yang tidak diinginkan. Kemudian dianggap tidak lagi berguna, dia jatuh ke sihir hitam dan membunuh Damian dengan tangannya sebelum menemui akhir tragisnya sendiri sesudahnya. Namun, ketika dia membuka matanya sekali lagi, dia kembali ke masa lalu. Ke masa lalu - hari ayah tercintanya, pemakaman Duke Den. Sejak saat itu, Chloe mengambil keputusan. Keputusan untuk tidak membiarkan kehidupan masa lalunya terulang kembali .. dan untuk menghukum kerabatnya dan pengikut yang berani meninggalkan keluarganya.

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54824372), [Naver](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8629075), [Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2057181273)

altTitles.ja: レッド

description.en:
Set in nineteenth-century America, Red is the last living survivor of a Native American tribe that was slaughtered by white men. On a long journey in search of revenge, he travels with Iero Ito, a samurai who ran away to America after being defeated in the Seinan civil war, and Angie, a mysterious prostitute. The bonds of friendship between the three are touching. Although it is all fiction, the story seems very real as it is based on actual battles between US troops, Apaches and other tribes.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics (2005)
description.pt-br: Situado na América do século 19, Red é o último sobrevivente vivo de uma tribo nativa americana que foi massacrada por homens brancos. Em uma longa jornada em busca de vingança, ele viaja com Iero Ito, um samurai que fugiu para a América após ser derrotado na guerra civil de Seinan, e Angie, uma misteriosa prostituta. Os laços de amizade entre os três são comoventes. Embora seja tudo ficção, a história parece muito real, pois é baseada em batalhas reais entre tropas americanas, apaches e outras tribos.

title.en: I Became the Only Healer in This World

altTitles.ru: Я стала единственным хилером в этом мире

altTitles.ja: この世界で唯一のヒーラーになりました

description.en:
Healer who is addicted to gambling has been on a single path for years. Somehow, the world changed and I became the world's only healer. [There is a place that needs you, a unique healer.] [Will you respond to the summons?] ‘What? 'You have a tank dealer but no healer?' No, what. Is there any balance for X network with tank damage but no healer? [The constellations watching you complain that this is not a game, but reality!] *** It has been several decades since the Gate appeared. I heard that a lot of strategies and data have been accumulated over the years. ‘Why is everyone proceeding so inefficiently? 'Frustrating?' I was serious about my strategy, so I just tried my best to close the gate. “It was you who saved me. “I made it so that only you can see it.” 1st place in the former rankings who were said to have been betrayed and went into hiding. “I need you. my savior “My life.” Head of the world's top 10 guild unions. “Don’t abandon me. Because I can’t breathe without you.” Up to 1st place in the current ranking. I was too busy clearing the gate, but strange guys started to come by. 

[Plate/Constellation/Hunter/Himsumjin/Munchkin/Yeojuwon Tower/Salvation]
description.ru:
Девушка, играющая за хилера на протяжении многих лет, так и не смогла ничего достичь. Однажды, невероятным образом она переместилась в другой мир, в котором не оказалось ни одного хилера.  
— Есть пати, которое хочет пригласить вас, невероятного и неповторимого хилера. Вы ответите на призыв?  
"А? У них есть танки и ДД, но ни одного хилера? У них тут вообще хоть что-то сбалансированно?"  — 
Это не игра, а реальность. И созвездия, защищающие тебя, будут жаловаться тебе на жизнь!    

***  
Врата появились несколько десятилетий назад. За это время накопилось множество тактик и сведений, но...  
— Что за унылые атаки в лоб? Ещё не надоело?  
Из-за очень наивной тактики врата брали напролом.  
— Это вы ведь меня спасли? Лишь благодаря вашим способностями.  
Преданный, скрывающийся бывший первый ранг...  
— О, моя спасительница, не покидай меня.  
...директор ассоциации 10 гильдий...  
— Прошу, не бросай меня. Я не смогу жить без тебя.  
...и даже нынешний первый ранг — каждый был восхищен ею.  
Когда она была занята тактикой прохождения врат, начали появляться странные дети, что совершенно не входило в её планы.

title.en: Yojouhan Ohi ~Marie Antoinette Tensei Ohi no Yarinaoshi~

altTitles.ja: 四畳半王妃　～マリー・アントワネット　転生王妃のやり直し～

altTitles.en: 4.5 Tatami Mat Queen ~Marie Antoinette: Reincarnated Queen's Redo~

description.en:
'Marie Antoinette came to my room that day...'

A Lolita-loving high school girl and the tragic Queen Marie-Antoinette in modern Japan. Born, raised and raised differently, the encounter between these two girls changes history.
description.ja: 悲劇の王妃マリー・アントワネットは処刑の瞬間。「誰も自分を知らない世界でやり直したい」と願った。その結果、若かりし少女の姿で現代日本に“転生”してしまったようで…？マリーが“転生”した先にいたのは、育ってきた環境から自己肯定感が低く、ロリータファッションを堂々と着こなせない自分を好きになれずにいる女子高生。時代も生まれ育ちも何もかも違う二人が現代日本で出会った時、ロリータファッションを通じて少女と歴史が変わっていく――

altTitles.ja: 仮面ライダーZX

description.en: All three Artists in one book. Digital Versions Delisted

title.en: I Raised My Younger Sister Beautifully

altTitles.en: I Raised My Little Sis Beautifully

altTitles.th: คราวนี้ฉันจะเลี้ยงน้องเป็นอย่างดี

altTitles.ja: 妹を可愛く育てたら大公 様に溺愛されました

description.en:
When Princess Fleta, who has been mistreated her entire life due to being born with a curse, summons the basilisk and destroys the palace, Princess Cezanne regrets that things could have turned out differently if someone had been by Fleta's side. So when she miraculously finds herself six years back in time, she is determined to take Fleta under her wing and fill her baby sister's life with nothing but joyful light. Will Cezanne be able to dispel the darkness inside Fleta and rewrite the ending?

---
The imperial family collapsed during one night by the basilisk, the summoned beast of darkness which was summoned by the cursed princess, Fleta. “If there is a next life, then… Can I really be your younger sister?” If I had approached you a little earlier, would it have been different from now? The last time everyone regretted it, the time miraculously returned to 6 years earlier. If this is the second chance we've been given.
description.ru: Императорская семья рухнула за одну ночь из-за василиска, призванного зверя тьмы, которого призвала проклятая принцесса Флета. «Если есть следующая жизнь, то… Могу ли я действительно быть твоей младшей сестрой?» Если бы я обратился к тебе немного раньше, было бы всё иначе, чем сейчас? Последний раз все об этом пожалели, время чудесным образом вернулось на 6 лет назад. Если это второй шанс, который нам дан...

altTitles.ja: ウイニング パス

description.en: Haruto Ichinose has an older brother, Shori Ichinose, who has excellent grades, is a basketball prodigy, and is very popular in school. Although he says he hates basketball, he trains alone and challenges his brother, only to be beaten back. On the other hand, his older brother Shori seems to recognize his "talent" more than anyone else, but who is he really...?
description.ja: 成績優秀、バスケは天才的、そして校内の人気者・一ノ瀬翔麗を兄に持つ一ノ瀬陽斗。バスケは大嫌いと言いつつ、一人特訓して兄に挑戦しては返り討ちに遭う日々。一方で兄・翔麗は誰よりも陽斗の「才能」を認めている様子だが、その正体は…!?
description.pt-br: Haruto Ichinose tem um irmão mais velho, Shori Ichinose, que tem notas excelentes, é um prodígio do basquete e é muito popular na escola. Embora Haruto diga que odeia basquete, ele treina sozinho e desafia seu irmão, apenas para ser derrotado. Por outro lado, seu irmão mais velho Shori parece reconhecer seu "talento" mais do que qualquer outra pessoa, mas quem ele realmente é...?

altTitles.th: ฮานะมารุ อนุบาลเด็กดีนะจะบอกให้

altTitles.ja: はなまる幼稚園

description.en: Anzu goes to a preschool with her friends, the shy Koume and the eccentric Hiiragi. Together, they try to gain Anzu attention from their male caretaker Tsuchida, though he is clearly more interested in the pretty Yamamoto who supervises the class next door.
description.pt-br:
Anzu é uma criança do jardim de infância com uma grande paixão por seu professor Tsuchida, mas Tsuchida claramente prefere Yamamoto, uma jovem professora que lida com a classe ao lado, e Anzu tem suas duas amigas para ajudá-la: a tímida Koume e a excêntrica Hiiragi.

NOTA: Hanamaru é o equivalente à estrela de ouro concedida para as crianças por um bom trabalho na escolas.

altTitles.ja: アイツノカノジョ

altTitles.fr: La petite amie de ce mec

description.en: It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...
description.ja:
気になるあの娘は、”親友の”彼女。

始まりの季節、春。主人公・リクの家を訪れた美少女・雫は「いいよ、何しても。」と、リクを誘う。しかし雫は、“親友（アイツ）の彼女”。
description.pt-br: É abril do meu terceiro e último ano no ensino médio... Mas a linda garota por quem tenho uma queda é a namorada do meu melhor amigo. Assim começa meu ano pisando em um terreno perigoso...

title.en: I Need Someone to Stop My Older Brothers

altTitles.ko: 누가 우리 오빠들 좀 말려 주세요

description.en:
I only went to calm the disturbance in front of my house, but the one I encountered was the Demon King that I punished, and unfortunately, I was falsely accused of being the demon king and died in the hand of the subjugation team.

‘I’ll kick your ass, Pamel Asinov! I’ll make you shed tears from both of your eyes!’

Among them, the worst one was the hero, Pamel Asinov, who drove me to death as a Demon King!

But when I pleaded to take revenge, I opened my eyes, 500 years later! Pamel’s been dead for a long time, and the ‘brothers’ who came one day…

“Purple eyes. It’s not a color that anyone can have.”
“But I was like this from the beginning.”
“Yes, you were. Because you are the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov.”
“…the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov?”

Of all people, I’m the daughter of ‘that’ Asinov? It’s nice to live a peaceful life, but I was born an enemy’s blood!

‘All the brothers in this house have a habit of hugging people.’

This shitty family. I have to hate them, but why do I keep getting attached to them?

title.en: Drawing: Saikyou Mangaka wa Oekaki Skill de Isekai Musou Suru!

altTitles.ja: ドローイング 最強漫画家はお絵かきスキルで異世界無双する！

altTitles.en: Drawing: The Greatest Mangaka Becomes a Skilled “Martial Artist” in Another World

altTitles.zh-hk: 作畫 最強漫畫家利用繪畫技能在異世界開無雙！

altTitles.vi: Drawing: Mangaka Mạnh Nhất Với Kỹ Năng Vẽ Tranh Vô Song Tại Dị Giới

description.en:
Akira Kamishiro was a very successful manga author, who was diagnosed with blood cancer one day. He regretted the way he lived, where he could only build up empty relationships. Angry at his mother for asking him to send her some money, he died in a car accident. He was given a chance to choose his new mother and reincarnate in another world.

Akira, not wanting to have a repeat of his past life, decided to choose an ordinary but safe life.. He was reincarnated as Akira, the only son of a magic store, with his previous life's memories. He had no talent for swordsmanship or magic, but he didn’t care as he was still loved by his family. At one point, he realized that he can embody various things by "drawing a picture". That's when he noticed his cheat ability...!?
description.ja: 漫画家として大成功を収めていた神代彰は、成功だけに囚われて人間関係を蔑ろにし続けた自分の人生を後悔しながら死んでしまう。そんな彰を待っていたのは、自分で母親を選んで異世界転生するチャンス！？転生した彰は剣術も魔法もダメダメだったが、家族に愛されながら平穏な生活を送っていた。しかしあるとき、「絵を描く」ことでいろいろなものを具現化できるチート能力に気がついてしまって……？
description.vi: Akira, một họa sĩ tài năng nhưng sau khi bị bệnh ung thư anh đã nhận ra xung quanh mình chẳng còn gì ngoại trừ cái danh hiệu "thành công" của mình. Không có người đi cùng mình đến bệnh viện, người mẹ, người thân duy nhất của anh cũng đòi anh đưa tiền mới chịu đi cùng anh. Trong cơn giận anh đã vô tình gây tai nạn và được chuyển sinh sang thế giới khác. Một thế giới mới với một cuộc sống mới anh quyết định sống một cách bình thường và giữ gìn hạnh phúc gia đình nhỏ nhoi của mình
description.pt-br: Akira Kamidai lamenta ter conseguido construir apenas uma relação vazia, embora tenha feito muito sucesso como cartunista. Uma vida em um lugar medíocre onde eu queria que Akira fosse uma pessoa com magia. Reencarnação em uma loja voltada para a esgrima. Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Eu estava vivendo uma vida ideal para uma família amada por espadachins. Descobri a habilidade de trapaça que encarnar várias coisas atravéz de um ”desenho”…? Uma aventura mundial diferente para proteger seu paradeiro, tecida por Akira que quer levar uma vida normal...!

title.en: Reincarnated as a Genius Prodigy of a Prestigious Family

altTitles.en: Reincarnated as a Genius Prodigy of a Prestigious Family

description.en:
His talent was forged on the battlefield, but before he could fully develop it, he died.

However, when he opened his eyes again, he realized he had been reborn as Dane Sogres, the youngest son of a prestigious count.

The talent he now possessed... was not limited to just one field?!

A talent in spearmanship, assassination, magic, summoning, and even swordsmanship—which he had not been able to develop fully before!

He can finally nurture his endless talent in the embrace of the happy family he had always longed for.

"Spearmanship! Dane must absolutely learn spearmanship!"

"Are you saying that because you really don't know how useful learning stealth and assassination skills could be?"

"Magic is the future, Father, Mother!"

"For my younger brother... summoning would also be really nice..."

...Mm, this is a happy family, right?
description.ko:
전장에서 쓸쓸한 죽음을 맞이했는데,
명가의 사랑받는 막내아들로 다시 태어나다?

창술, 암살, 마법, 소환, 검술…
끝을 모르는 재능까지!

항상 바라왔던 행복한 가족들 속에서,
내가 가진 재능을 펼쳐 보이겠어!

altTitles.ja: アンネームドメモリー

description.en:
*“As long as you’re the master of that sword and I’m a witch, someday you’ll have to kill me for real.”*

As a child, Oscar, Crown Prince of Farsas, had been cursed to be childless. At the age of 20, he paid a visit to Tinassha, the strongest witch in the continent, to break the curse. He came back bringing Tinassha along as his protector, and in the one year until his contract with her expired, he got embroiled into her past, and an even greater destiny.
description.es:
*"Mientras seas el dueño de esa espada y yo una bruja, algún día tendrás que matarme de verdad".*

De niño, Óscar, príncipe heredero de Farsas, había sido maldecido a no tener hijos. A los 20 años, visitó a Tinassha, la bruja más fuerte del continente, para romper la maldición. Volvió con Tinassha como protectora, y en el año que le quedaba hasta que expirara su contrato con ella, se vio envuelto en su pasado y en un destino aún mayor.
description.fr: Oscar, prince héritier du grand royaume de Farsas, se rend chez Tinasha, la sorcière la plus puissante du continent, pour lever une malédiction dont il est victime depuis sa jeunesse, qui l’empêche d’avoir des enfants. Lorsqu’il passe l’épreuve de la “Tour de la sorcière”, qui lui donne le droit à n’importe quel souhait, il demande alors la main de Tinasha !
description.ja:
呪われた王と最強の魔女が紡ぐ、【愛】と【呪い】の一大叙事詩が開幕！

このライトノベルがすごい！2020（宝島社刊）にて単行本部門とノベルズ部門でダブル１位となった伝説的ＷＥＢノベルが待望のコミック化！

永い時を生き、絶大な力で災厄を呼ぶ異端――魔女。
強国ファルサスの王太子・オスカーは、幼い頃に受けたある呪いを解くために、世界最強と名高い「青き月の魔女」のもとを訪れる。
“魔女の塔”の試練を乗り越えて契約者となったオスカーだが彼が望んだのは……。

altTitles.ja: 瞳ちゃんは人見知り

altTitles.it: Hitomi-chan è timida con gli sconosciuti

description.en: One day, the ordinary 2nd year high schooler Yuu Usami accidentally encounters a big girl with a scary look. Turns out she's glaring at him, but why…?! Although Hitomi Takano looks like she's scary and awkward, she's actually a kind and adorable girl. This one shall be a happy, heartwarming slice-of-life comedy.
description.es:
Un día, el estudiante de 2do año Yuu Yusami se encuentra por accidente con una muchacha grande con una mirada temeraria. Resulta que ella símplemente lo está observando… pero ¿por qué? A pesar de que Hitomi Takano se ve espeluznante y huraña, ella en realidad es querida y adorable. Ésta será una feliz y grata comedia de la vida cotidiana.  
  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Mangaka’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/910858)  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/cyorisukenosuke)
description.fr: Un jour, Yuu Usami – lycéen ordinaire en deuxième année – rencontre une grande fille avec un regard effrayant. Elle a l’air de le fusiller du regard, mais pourquoi…?! Pourtant, même si Hitomi Takano fait peur et est maladroite, elle est en réalité une fille gentille et adorable. Bienvenue dans une comédie/tranche de vie qui va vous réchauffer le cœur !
description.ja:
どこにでもいる平凡な高校2年生の宇佐見君は、ある日、偶然に居合わせた"何やら目つきが悪くていろいろとおっきな女の子"に、なぜか睨みつけられてしまい…!?
見た目は怖くて不器用だけど、実は優しくて可愛い三白眼女子の、楽しくてハートフルな日常コメディ…開幕!!
description.ru: Однажды обыкновенный старшеклассник 2-го года Юу Усами случайно встречает большую девушку со страшным взглядом. По какой-то причине она не отрывает от него глаз, но он ведь ей ничего не делал!.. Хотя Хитоми Такано выглядит страшной и неприветливой, на самом деле она добрая и очаровательная девушка.
description.pt-br: Em um dia comum, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, chamado Usami Yuu, se encontra acidentalmente com Takano Hitomi, uma garota alta e que tem um olhar assustador. Acontece que ela está olhando diretamente para ele. Mas embora Hitomi pareça assustadora e desajeitada, na verdade ela é uma garota gentil e adorável que simplesmente quer se tornar mais sociável.

title.en: Prices Depreciated, and I Became the World's Richest Person

altTitles.zh: 开局物价贬值，我成为了世界首富

description.en: I woke up to find the world had changed! Prices everywhere have decreased by a million times, yet my funds remain the same, making me wealthier than the world’s richest person! How should I spend all this money…

altTitles.ja: 可愛原先輩はかわいいがすき！

description.en:
Saotome-kun is short and terrible at sports. He thought that studying was his only good point, but in his new high school, his grades are a far cry from stellar. As he was feeling down and thinking he had nothing, the academically brilliant, sporty, elegant, and beautiful "Perfect Student Council President" Kawaibara-senpai approached him.
Having maintained her position at the top of the grade since she enrolled, she offers to tutor Saotome on one condition: he must wear a sailor uniform while studying with her. Their secret study sessions after school begin...
description.ja: 同作の主人公・早乙女くんは、背が小さく運動も苦手で、勉強だけが自分の取り柄だと考えていたが、入学した高校ではその勉強でもトップには程遠く、「自分にはなにもない」と落ち込んでいた。そんな早乙女に声をかけたのは、文武両道、容姿端麗な“完璧生徒会長”の可愛原（かわいばら）先輩。入試以来学年首席を守り続けている彼女は、早乙女に「特別に勉強を教えてあげてもいい」と提案する。しかしその条件として、自分と勉強しているときはセーラー服を着てほしいと女装を強要してきて……。放課後、秘密の勉強会が始まる。

description.en:
What if the victim of bullying suddenly becomes attractive. Do you still want to bully him again? Or it will become a new problem for the bully.

Arthur had enough bullying by Elsa and being called meat buns. One day he decided to exercise to lose some weight in hopes of not getting bullied again. But something happened and changed his life forever.
description.kk: Егер қорқыту құрбаны кенеттен тартымды болса ше? Сіз оны әлі де мазақ еткіңіз келе ме? Немесе бұл бұзақы үшін жаңа мәселе болады. Артур Элзаның қорқытуынан және оны  тоқаш деп атаудан жалықты. Бірде ол спортпен шұғылдануды шешті, енді оны мазақ етпейді деген үмітпен. Бірақ оның өмірін мәңгілікке өзгерткен нәрсе болды
description.pt-br:
E se a vítima de bullying de repente se tornar atraente? Você ainda quer intimidá-lo novamente? Ou se tornará um novo problema para o agressor. 

Arthur teve bastante bullying de Elsa e sendo chamado de pãezinhos de carne. Um dia ele decidiu se exercitar para perder peso na esperança de não sofrer bullying novamente. Mas algo aconteceu e mudou sua vida para sempre.

title.en: Konna ni Kawaii Otose-kun ga Onna no Ko no Hazu ga nai

altTitles.ja: こんなにカワイイ音瀬くんが女の子のはずがない

altTitles.en: This Cute Otose-kun Can’t Possibly Be a Girl

description.en: Otose-kun, a male college student, loves being "cute" while crossdressing! But one day, his classmate Tachibana (♂) finds out about his hobby. What does Tachibana want in exchange for keeping the secret? They connect with each other through "cuteness" ♪
description.ja: 男子大学生、音瀬くんは〝カワイイ自分〟が大好き！でもある時、同級生の橘(♂)に、女装の趣味がバレちゃった…!?秘密をバラさない代わりに橘が音瀬くんに突きつけた条件とは??〝カワイイ〟でツナがる♪

altTitles.ja: この関係は合法です!

description.en:
YES Sister, NO Touch!

Kouta, who is extremely siscon, decides to live alone in order to "escape from his little sister ". One day, however, he picks up a runaway girl named Ui, who is full of younger sisterly feelings. Although she looks and acts like a child, she is in fact a beautiful 19-year-old girl with big tits!

Protect his sister? or Crossing the line? The days of agony begin!
description.ja: YESシスター、NOタッチ!?極度のシスコンの洸太は、「脱・妹」を目指し一人暮らしをすることに。だがある日、妹感満載の家出少女・初（うい）を拾ってしまう。顔もしぐさも幼い初だが、実は19歳の巨乳美少女だった！妹を守る？一線を超えちゃう!?悶々の日々が始まる！
